dict.acceptation: 糊涂的；迷乱的；混杂的；不清楚的；

sent.orig: And ceramics, Bumpy Road uneven years, who had had not confused, lose, creepy and confused?
sent.trans: 而长长短短、坎坎坷坷的岁月里，谁又不曾有过迷惑、迷失、迷离、迷茫呢？

sent.orig: Everything is and-go, confused look ahead, then look at the scenery.
sent.trans: 一切都是走走停停，迷茫的看看前方，再看看周围的风景。

sent.orig: The question is so hard, and we're getting confused.
sent.trans: 这问题太难，我们感到困惑。

sent.orig: That smoking incense, the candles flashing light, scattered, confused by my eyes.
sent.trans: 那香冒着烟，那蜡烛闪着光，星星点点的，迷茫了我的眼睛。

sent.orig: I feel so confused and don't know what to do when it comes to love.
sent.trans: 一谈到爱情，我就很困惑，也不知道该怎么办。
